TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Atonan, title = Atonan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Atonan} }

S.FORM: alang Atonan ga niya mki sku Hualien Keng atu Ci'an go, kwara sali buwan nya ga 863 buwan, 2,103 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 26% kyan ku 541 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 74% kyan ku 1,562 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 17%, Truku 2%, Tayan 1%, Bunun 3%, Paywan 1%, Puyuma 1%. maki qu ngasal bziran, ngasal pqwasan biru'. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Atonan hya' ga wsilung krahu'. tay 'zil na Atonan hya' ga rgyax krahu'. tay mkyahu' na Atonan hya' ga llyung. tay mkraya' na Atonan hya' ga Hualien go. tay mkraya' na Atonan hya' ga Citekudan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy maki 1 pqwasan biru 'laqi' cikuy. pqwasan biru 'laqi' mrkyas tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Atonan ga niya mki sko Hoalien Keng ato Ci'an go, kwara sali bowan nya ga 863 bowan, 2,103 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 26% kyan ko 541 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 74% kyan ko 1,562 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 17%, Troko 2%, Tayan 1%, Bonon 3%, Paywan 1%, Poyoma 1%. maki qo ngasal bziran, ngasal pqwasan biro'. rhzyal kki'an tay 'llaw na Atonan hya' ga wsilong kraho'. tay 'zil na Atonan hya' ga rgyax kraho'. tay mkyaho' na Atonan hya' ga llyong. tay mkraya' na Atonan hya' ga Hoalien go. tay mkraya' na Atonan hya' ga Citekodan. rekisi kayal kyokay ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy maki 1 pqwasan biro 'laqi' cikoy. pqwasan biro 'laqi' mrkyas toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
